Battera::

She walked around the mess hall and returned back to her table. She 
was using her hightened hearing and sonic wave hear what was being 
said about the room. So far, other than Flicker showing her no trust, 
which was expected from a pred, she didn't find a clue to 
Nightlight's where abouts. She wasn't going ot give up yet. She 
looked at Flicker. "So how many of us are there. I over heard some 
bots talking earlier about getting the slag kicked out of them from 
the maximals in a previous battle. I hope this will not be the case 
in the future? I do not wish to be imprisioned again by those weak 
sparked, waste of metal fools."
